about_the_game:
Extreme Dash: Reloaded is an extremely fast arcade game. Challenge yourself with this minimal, colorful neon themed game featuring an awesome electronic soundtrack!

Your goal is to survive for 60 seconds in order to unlock the next level. It looks easy, but it will certainly take you a *few* tries to achieve it. Keep beating the 60 seconds marks to unlock several gamemodes with different mechanics that will make your brain go crazy!

  • 7 Different Game modes
  • Each one with 3 difficulty levels
  • Unlock 36 Unique skins that change the looks of your character (and some unique that change other things too!)
  • Amazing Soundtrack
  • Very simple controls
  • Hours of fun and challenges
  • Beautiful designed scenarios

name: Extreme Dash: Reloaded

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 support
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
